-= Info about function 'MATH' =-
[Syntax] MATH(<number1><op><number2>[,<type_of_result>])
[Synopsis] Performs Mathematical Functions
[Description] Perform calculation on number1 to number2. Valid ops are: +,-,/,*,%,<<,>>,^,AND,OR,XOR,<,>,>=,<=,== and behave as their C equivalents. <type_of_result> - wanted type of result: f, float - float(default) i, int - integer, h, hex - hex, c, char - char Example: Set(i=${MATH(123%16,int)}) - sets var i=11
